description: To vary condition 1 of planning permission (12F/2198) to extend period of temporary permission for a further 3 years - To use dockside and 1 no. existing brick building as a diving, sailing, boating and maritime teaching academy in connection with the use of Collingwood and Salisbury Docks for such activities, including the siting of temporary structures (3 no. modular buildings, 4 no. shipping containers, 1 no. dive tank and 9 no. floating platoons), and the provision of timber decking, car parking and associated means of enclosure.
site_address: Collingwood Dock, Regent Road, Stanley Dock, Liverpool, L3 0AH
